                   â–€â–€  â–€    â–€   â–€ â–€â–€â–€â–€ â–€ â–€    â–€     â–€â–€   â–€â–€

 
 
Gears of War 4 for PC / Windows is a third-person shooter featuring a cover system. In terms of the mechanics, the game resembles the previous installments to a large degree. However, certain improvements were made, making the cover system more dynamic, which now allows the player mainly to use environmental objects to their advantage in combat (fragments of the ceiling can be dropped on the enemy hiding behind a cover for example). Now, the player can also attack the enemy with a knife thanks to the improved cover system. Most of the new elements concern the in-game weather. Storms raging on the planet fall into four categories and the two last kinds affect the course of battles to a large extent. Heavy winds can increase the range of fire or alter the bullets' flight direction. The heaviest gales force the player to fight for survival, because lightnings begin to fall from the sky for instance, and the player's task is to avoid them.



System requirements
Recommended: Intel Core i5-4690 3.0 GHz/AMD FX-8350 4.0 GHz, 8 GB RAM, graphic card 4 GB GeForce GTX 970/Radeon R9 290X or better, 80 GB HDD, Windows 10
Minimum: Intel Core i5-3470 3.0 GHz/AMD FX-6300 3.5 GHz, 8 GB RAM, graphic card 2 GB GeForce GTX 750/Radeon R7 260X or better, 80 GB HDD, Windows 10
